name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop123 - Let AI save money for smart retailers.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find matching products with any site's image. Get the best deals fast and easy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What it Does:
This plugin helps you find items that look the same as any picture you see online, and it finds them at very low prices.
Features:
1. Right-Click to Search: On any website, you can right-click on a picture to find the same product.
2. Best Matches: The results will show the most similar products, and they are very cheap.
3. Multi-Language and Currency: Supports more than 50 languages and about 40 different currencies.
4. Sort and Filter: You can sort by price, buy again rates, and filter by category.
5. Expert Help: A shopping expert will help you contact sellers and buy products, using your local language.
